name: memory-keeper
description: Hierarchical memory with ProMem fact extraction (L2), LiSA semantic grouping (L3), and Reflection auto-promotion (L4). Now with proactive haiku subagent for auto L2 generation.

customAgents.name: l2-summarizer
customAgents.description: Use this agent to extract L2 facts from session. Trigger proactively when auto-save fires or session ends. Creates verified facts for memory persistence.
